articles.content:
GORDON Ramsay travelled 246 miles back to London from Cornwall after a feud with his neighbours over him relocating to his second home.
The TV chef moved his family to his £4million coastal mansion … [+3530 chars]

articles.title: Lady Gaga – ‘Chromatica’ review: a pure pop celebration from an icon in a world of her own - NME
articles.description: The NME verdict on the sixth album from Lady Gaga, which has been preceded by the singles 'Stupid Love', 'Rain On Me' and 'Sour Candy'
articles.content: We first saw a glimpse of Chromatica the fictional planet Lady Gaga has created with her sixth album of the same name in the music video for lead single ‘Stupid Love’. The video opens with text that … [+4835 chars]

articles.author: Helen Kelly
articles.title: Kate Garraway struggling to 'stay strong' as she calls husband Derek 'every night' - Express
articles.description: KATE GARRAWAY'S husband Derek Draper remains in intensive care as he continues to fight coronavirus. The Good Morning Britain host has admitted she is struggling to find ways to stay strong for their children Darcey and Billy.
